org.springframework.cloud.sleuth

Interface SpanInjector<T>


  • public interface SpanInjector<T>
    Adopted from OpenTracing
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Marcin Grzejszczak

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void inject(Span span, T carrier)
      Takes two arguments: a Span instance, and a “carrier” object in which to inject that Span for cross-process propagation.

    • Method Detail

      • inject

        void inject(Span span,
            T carrier)
        Takes two arguments:
        • a Span instance, and
        • a “carrier” object in which to inject that Span for cross-process propagation.
        A “carrier” object is some sort of http or rpc envelope, for example HeaderGroup (from Apache HttpComponents). Attempting to inject to a carrier that has been registered/configured to this Tracer will result in a IllegalStateException.
